content: sock shoes by imawale these socks look as if they were socks worn in shoes they are worked from the top down with a heel flap and gussets the technique is slipped sts in two colors and the colors are reversed on the heel and the sole and separated from the leg and the instep by a braid worked as a vikkel braid on the horizontal part and a slipped stitch or a little cable around yarn sock yarn 100 g 420 m / 459 yds or 50 g 210 m / 229 yds in two colors with a nice contrast 50 g of each color 60 g for the larger size - mc has some stitches slipped on the cuff the heel and the sole - cc has some stitches slipped on the leg and the instep sock shoes 2024 imawale designs - all rights reserved 1 sizes size 64 sts european 38-39 size 72 sts european 40-42 size 80 sts european 43-45 foot circumference 19-20 21-23 24-25 cm 7 5-8 8 5-9 9 5-10 inches needles the pattern is written for magic loop but dpns or a short circular needle are fine a second circular needle or dpns a size smaller is needed for the heel flap and the heel turn although there are many slipped stitches the fabric is stretchy you may use your usual stitch count and the same needle for the cuff ribbing and the heel flap/turn but if you are a tight knitter you may go up a needle size for the leg and the foot gauge 8 5 sts x 13 rds per inch 34 sts x 52 rds per 10 cm in pattern notions tapestry needle three markers socks on photo size 72 sts yarn regia fashion shiné mc in bordeaux and cc in pink i used 2 25 mm us 1 for the ribbing of the cuff and the heel flap/turn and 2 5 mm us 1 5 for the rest of the sock abbreviations and key k knit on rs purl on ws p purl on ws knit on rs yo yarn over ktbl knit through the back loop k2tog knit 2 sts together ssk sl1 knitwise sl1 knitwise k2togtbl n needle k2togtbl knit 2 sts together through the back loop sl slip purlwise st sts stitch stiches round rds round rounds bor begining of round ws wrong side rs right side ssp sl1 knitwise sl1 knitwise place both sts back on left n and p them through the back loop c2l cable two to the left from the back sl the right n into the second st on the left n slip both sts off the left n pick up at once the first st back on the left n place the st on the right n back to the left n k2 c2r cable two to the right with the right n sl off the two first sts of the left n as if to k2tog place the
